ygData.subject: Yggdrasil is off alone
ygData.msgSnippet: The huge bot grumbled furiously. None of his team had shown up. Probably all too drunk to make it back, he thought. He opened a commline down to the planet

The huge bot grumbled furiously. None of his team had shown up. 
Probably all too drunk to make it back, he thought. He opened a 
commline down to the planet below.

Yggdrasil: Maximal Iron Squad, since the orders I received concerned 
my relative, I will not take the time to come down and kick your 
circuits. I am going alone and I place you under charges of order 
disobeyance. We will resolve this matter once I am back. Yggdrasil 
Prime, over and out.

He stood from his command chair in the station and went to the hatch 
of the Bullet.

The Bullet was not the most spacious of ships. It sported had drop 
chamber for the crew and a belly-mounted laser for bombardment attacks 
that were mostly used against heavily defended positions.

The Maximal entered the ship, started the engines and was soon out in 
space. It would be some time before he reached the wormhole, so he 
engaged the autopilot and tried to relax.
